\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&,row sep=small]
	{X^{n-1}} \&\& {B^n} \&\& {X^n} \&\& {B^{n+1}} \&\& {X^{n+1}} \\
	\& {C^{n-1}} \&\& {Z^n} \&\& {C^n} \&\& {Z^{n+1}} \\
	{H^{n-1}} \&\&\&\& {H^n} \&\&\&\& {H^{n+1}}
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-5, to=1-7]
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-7, to=1-9]
	\arrow[hook, from=1-7, to=2-8]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-6, to=1-7]
	\arrow[hook, from=2-8, to=1-9]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-8, to=3-9]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[hook, from=3-5, to=2-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
